heading.long: Nanthini has received multiple accolades reflecting her dedication to professional growth and excellence in her field.

sentence.medium: Nanthini continually enhances her qualifications through recognized training programs and workshops.
sentence.long: Her commitment to continuous learning has earned her accolades and certifications from reputable organizations in the website development industry.

columns.title-medium: Award for Excellence in Web Design 2023
columns.sentence-medium: Achieved prestigious recognition for innovative and user-friendly website designs.

columns.title-medium: Certified Web Developer by Tech Institute
columns.sentence-short: Certified as a professional web developer.
columns.sentence-medium: Successfully completed rigorous training and certification program in web development.

columns.sentence-medium: Awarded for leading projects that drive tech innovations and community engagement.

list.list-item-long: Achieved certification in web development reflecting strong technical skills and knowledge.
